tool.name: AddImgCol2MapbyTag
tool.displayname: Add GEE Image Collection to Map by Asset Tag

param.name: asset_tag
param.displayname: Specify GEE Image Collection Asset Tag
param.dialogReference: The asset tag could be found at the dataset information page. For example, “ee.ImageCollection('COPERNICUS/S2_SR')” loads the Google Earth Engine Image Collection by asset tag "COPERNICUS/S2_SR".

param.name: filter_dates
param.dialogReference:
The user can filter the image collection by starting and ending dates. The typical formats of date strings are listed below.

  1. Year only, '2020'

  2. Year and month, '2020-07'

  3. Year, month and date, '2020-07-01'

  4. Year, month, date, and time, '2020-07-05T06:34:46'

For more information, please visit https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/apidocs/ee-imagecollection-filterdate

param.name: filter_bounds
param.dialogReference: Filter a collection by intersection with point geometry. Items in the collection with a footprint that fails to intersect the given geometry will be excluded.

param.name: use_centroid
param.displayname: Use the center of the current map view extent
param.dialogReference: Use the centroid of the current map view as the point geometry.

param.name: images
param.dialogReference: The filtered images will be listed here. Select one image to add per run.

param.name: bands
param.displayname: Specify three bands for RGB visualization
param.dialogReference: The image dataset could contain multiple bands. However, the visualization only assigns the first three bands to produce RGB representation. For more information, please visit https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/guides/image_visualization

param.name: min_val
param.displayname: Specify the minimum value for visualization
param.dialogReference: The value(s) to map to 0. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band.

param.name: max_val
param.displayname: Specify the maximum value for visualization
param.dialogReference: The value(s) to map to 255. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band.

param.name: gamma
param.dialogReference: The value(s) by which to multiply each pixel value. Specify a number or comma-separated list of three numbers, one for each band, for example, 0.95, 1.1, 1

param.name: palette
param.displayname: Specify color palette in CSS-style color strings for visualization
param.dialogReference: List of CSS-style color strings (single-band images only). Specify comma-separated list of hex strings, for example, '00A600','63C600','E6E600'

param.name: out_json
param.displayname: Save the filtered image collection to serialized JSON file
param.dialogReference: Save the filtered image collection to a serialized JSON object for future use.

tool.summary: This script adds the Google Earth Engine Image Collection to ArcPro as a base map by its asset tag and customizes the visualization parameters. The user can only add one image to ArcPro per run. Please note that the dataset is added as a Tiled Service Layer (TSL), which cannot be edited directly. The user will need to download the dataset for analysis in ArcPro. To browse all datasets, please visit https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog.

idCitation.resTitle: Add GEE Image Collection to Map by Asset Tag
